item.title: Development, optimisation and evaluation of apps for smoking cessation and alcohol reduction
item.description: I’m regularly involved in the development, optimisation and evaluation of apps for smoking cessation and alcohol reduction, including the evaluation of digitally enabled personal carbon monoxide monitors and related smoking cessation apps, the refinement of the content and design of the Drink Less app and the evaluation of the popular Smoke Free app in a parallel-arm, randomised controlled trial.
